REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f2194 reute r f BC-VF-CORP-<VFC>-BOOSTS 10-20 0042

TEXT.TITLE: VF CORP <VFC> BOOSTS DIVIDEND
TEXT.BODY:
VF Corp said it increased its quarterly cash dividend to 21 cts per share, from 18 cts a share. The company said the dividend is payable December 18, to shareholders of record December eight.
Reuter
